name: kilo-icon
description: Kilo Design System Icon Font generator
author: Denis Gruba <denis.gruba@mypthub.net>

scripts.build:font: icon-font-generator src/icons/*.svg -o dist/icon-font --name='kilo-icons' --types='ttf, woff, woff2, eot'
scripts.build:ligatures: icon-font-generator src/icons/*.svg -o dist/liga-font --name='kilo-icons' --types='ttf, woff, woff2, eot' --tag='i' --selector='.k-icon' --ligature --htmltp=src/templates/html.hbs --csstp=src/templates/css.hbs
